attributes.action: Have a government department to find missing children, and to keep people updated, by a monthly television programme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So many  little children are going missing now days, please can we have a monthly programme on television, paid for by the government,something like crimewatch to highlight all missing children, so many people are interested in this,trying to find and save innocent children, please help.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Have a government department to find missing children, and to keep people updated, by a monthly television programme."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19338


Prime Minister's Office
